News.headline: Match Preview: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League match against Maidstone United on Tuesday.
News.description:
The Daggers travel to Kent on the back of a 2-0 away win against York. Oliver Hawkins and Luke Guttridge were on the scoresheet to end the Daggers’ four match winless run.
 
Maidstone currently sit 17th in the Vanarama National League following their promotion last season. They were beaten at home on Saturday 3-0 by Woking.
 
Previous 5 Results

Daggers
York 0-2 Daggers
Halifax 2-1 Daggers (FA Cup)
Daggers 0-5 Gateshead
Daggers 0-0 Halifax (FA Cup) 
Forest Green 1-1 Daggers 
 
Maidstone United
Maidstone 0-3 Woking
Rochdale 2-0 Maidstone (FA Cup)
Southport 3-2 Maidstone
Maidstone 2-2 Rochdale (FA Cup)
Maidstone 2-1 Macclesfield
 
Team News
Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams and  Howell could still miss out following their injuries.  Robinson could feature after missing out on Saturday. 
 
Previous Meetings
This will be the first time that the Daggers and Maidstone will meet in a competitive fixture. The two teams met each other in last year’s pre-season, with the Daggers winning 1-0.
 
Fixtures
There are 10 other Vanarama National League fixtures on Tuesday with a 7:45pm kick off (unless stated)
 
Aldershot V Eastleigh
Barrow V Guiseley
Boreham Wood V Sutton
Braintree v Bromley
Chester V Southport
Dover V Woking
Forest Green v Tranmere
Gateshead V Macclesfield
Maidstone V Dagenham and Redbridge
Torquay v Solihull
York V Lincoln
 
Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.
 
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.

An away guide for the game can be found here.
